title: Market Spaace
author: Market Spaace
content: Hi there,Is anyone here from Australia? Wanted to connect with some Australian Bitcoin/Crypto enthusiasts. What do you guys think of this initiative by Crypto.com? https://stockhead.com.au/cryptocurrency/otr-petrol-stations-and-convenience-stores-launch-crypto-com-payment-option-across-three-aussie-states/
